about_the_game:
Forklift Certified

GET READY TO BE CERTIFIED!

ABOUT THIS GAME
Welcome to Forklift Certified, a unique single-player 3D top-down puzzle experience where you can kick back, unwind, and enjoy clever challenges at your own pace. Take control of a forklift to navigate intricate puzzles, activate mechanisms, and conquer challenges in 10 handcrafted levels, each set in a distinct and creative environment.

FEATURES

🚜 Engaging Forklift-Based Gameplay

  • Use your forklift to interact with the environment: activate buttons, flip switches, and deliver puzzle pieces to their correct locations.

🧩 10 Handcrafted Levels Across Unique Locations

  • Solve puzzles in diverse environments, from an industrial trainyard to the relaxing farm, through a mysterious dungeon, and more!

🎮 Exciting Game Modes

  • Time Trial Mode: Race against the clock to beat bronze, silver, or gold times.

  • Fuel Mode: Keep your forklift running by collecting gas cans as you navigate each level.

  • Limited Pickup Mode: The forklift's hydraulics are running low, limiting the number of objects you can pick up per level. Strategize carefully!

📄 Find the Certification Manual Pages

  • Every level features a hidden certification manual page waiting to be discovered.

🎖️ Certifications

  • Track your progress and achievements with a variety of certifications to complete. Can you become fully forklift certified?

🎨 Custom Forklift Skins

  • Unlock and equip a variety of fun and quirky forklift designs to personalize your ride.

🎵 Immersive Audio & Visuals

  • Enjoy cel-shaded graphics and a dynamic soundtrack that create a calming and engaging atmosphere.
